name: PMMP5Converter
author: VsrStudio
description: Convert PocketMine plugins (API 3/4) to API 5 using Wertzui123's PMMP5Converter. Upload plugins to /plugins and get converted ones in /converted-plugins.
startup: echo '[Startup] Starting PMMP5Converter...'; php PMMP5Converter/converter.php plugins/ converted-plugins/; echo '[Done] Conversion complete.'

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt update && apt install -y git php-cli unzip curl

mkdir -p /mnt/server/plugins /mnt/server/converted-plugins
cd /mnt/server

if [ -d "PMMP5Converter" ]; then
  echo "[Info] PMMP5Converter already exists, pulling latest version..."
  cd PMMP5Converter && git pull
else
  echo "[Info] Cloning PMMP5Converter..."
  git clone https://github.com/Wertzui123/PMMP5Converter.git
fi

cd /mnt/server

if [ ! -f "PMMP5Converter/converter.php" ]; then
  echo "[Error] converter.php not found!" >&2
  exit 1
fi

echo "[Done] Installation complete. Upload your plugins to /plugins and start the server to convert them."
